bullets.text: U.S. dollar hit a four-year low, suffering its worst one-day slide since April, adding FX volatility and inflation uncertainty.
Fed decision looms; markets are focused on timing of rate cuts and whether guidance shifts amid weakening dollar and slowing growth signals.
Health insurers sold off after UnitedHealth guided to 2026 revenue decline, dragging peers and pressuring the Dow; signals reimbursement/cost headwinds.
Homebuyers are backing out of purchase contracts at the fastest pace in nearly a decade, pointing to affordability strain and potential housing-market cooling.
U.S. population growth slowed sharply as immigration fell, implying weaker labor-force growth, slower trend GDP, and added pressure on long-run fiscal dynamics.
Immigration enforcement backlash intensifies: Minnesota ICE actions and protests spur court interventions and Democratic impeachment threats against DHS Secretary Noem.
U.S. government nears partial shutdown risk over DHS funding, potentially disrupting federal operations and amplifying policy uncertainty around immigration and security.
Denmark questions U.S. alliance durability as Trump revisits Greenland interest, raising Arctic security stakes and complicating NATO cohesion.
Study estimates Ukraine-war troop casualties nearing 2 million, underscoring the conflict’s attrition scale and long-term regional security and economic damage.
Judge revived an offshore wind project Trump halted near Martha’s Vineyard, signaling legal resilience for U.S. renewables despite political opposition.
Amazon is restructuring: cloud layoffs, grocery reorganization, and closing/converting physical Fresh/Go stores—pivoting toward efficiency and clearer retail strategy.
AI infrastructure investment accelerates: Meta agreed to pay Corning up to $6B for data-center fiber; Anthropic fundraising reportedly pushed toward $20B.
Quantum and materials research: claims of a 'transistor moment' for quantum tech and new magnetic-order insights could reshape computing and superconductivity roadmaps.
Public-health research tightens causal links between obesity/high blood pressure and dementia, strengthening the economic case for prevention and cardiometabolic interventions.
Security risk reminder: SoundCloud breach added to HaveIBeenPwned; OpenSSL disclosed a CMS parsing stack buffer overflow, highlighting ongoing exposure in widely used software.
